Before my first day at Berkeley over last summer, I never expected to become a promiscuous person. As a horny freshman as I was, though, I downloaded Grindr and checked the happenings around campus. I was greeted with a message from a senior who was working on campus at the moment. At first I didn't expect the conversation to go anywhere, but as we talked, I decided to meet up. Surprisingly, he asked me to meet up on campus in a Lab in Stanley and added that a third person would be watching. I'm not sure why I still thought that was a good idea on my first date but I went through with it. In the end, I didn't regret it and actually became friends with benefits with the guy.

The first time I hooked up with a guy we had sex on campus. It was a gameday and I would go on to date this guy for over a year. I told him it was a fantasy of mine to have sex against the campanile and he was like let’s do it. So we tried to have sex In the tree area by the campanile but it was like 9pm on a night gameday so there were too many people. We then moved to these random tables by haviland Hall I think and had pretty dope table sex. Anyways, that’s the story of the first time I hooked up with my then boyfriend.

Freshman year. I got on a Tinder date with a girl whom I hoped to be in a long-term relationship with. Sex was in the back of my mind, but I prioritized getting to know each other and spending time together more. However, during this first date, we walked through campus in the middle of the night, made out, and she sucked my dick near the Chancellor’s house. She got a boyfriend a week later.

My freshman year, I had sex with my girlfriend for the first time in the fire escape of Unit 1 where she was an RA. We were both wearing dresses and I thought everyone could see but quickly stopped caring. I felt like the coolest lesbian ever.

I was her GSI the prior year but we had never done anything with each other. We were walking through a bitterly cold Fall campus at 2am. It was the night of Daylight's Savings Time. We traipsed around on the walkways as she pointed out her favorite trees to climb and which buildings she had classes in. She eventually led me down a gully to her favorite spot to smoke weed: a sewer-like graffiti-covered tunnel through which Strawberry Creek snaked. I'd never had sex outdoors so I started making moves. We were wearing our winter clothes: me donning a military-style coat and her wearing her Cal sweater. We dropped our pants down to our knees, keeping our upper half's clothed to retain warmth. The cold air whisked over my hard dick. She bent over, her head facing a lewd graffiti marking on the wall. It didn't go in too easily, but I couldn't blame her. I chalked it up to the weather. I began to get aggressive but with every reckless thrust I would almost get knocked backward into the frigid creek. I found myself frequently regaining my footing on the precarious, roughed-up concrete. This distraction, combined with the freezing brisk air and relatively dry vagina really took me out of it. After 5 minutes or so of ridiculousness, I pulled out, neither of us having cum, and called it quits. We buttoned our pants and climbed back out of the ravine, laughing to ourselves about the silly experience. I thanked her for helping me lose my outdoor virginity and told her we should do it again sometime in a nice, cosy warm bed. She agreed.
